author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thoothukudi Second Additional Sessions Court Judge T. Jeyarajan on Wednesday sentenced a person accused in a murder case to undergo life imprisonment. According to prosecution, M. Ashok Kumar (25) of Polpettai, Thoothukudi, was found guilty of murdering M. Ilayaperumal alias Durai (40) of the same locality on September 16 in 2014. The accused got irked as Ilayaperumal teased a woman at the locality and murdered him.

Thoothukudi North police filed a case. Four others in the case were acquitted. The accused was punished under Section 302 of th

e Indian Penal Code. The judge also imposed a fine of Rs.1,000 on the accused.
title: Man sentenced to life imprisonment
